#installing the plugin on your computer.

= How to install the plugin =

  # go to eclipse home directory
  # unzip the content of the alloy4eclipsexxxx.zip file
  # launch eclipse using the -clean parameter

= How to update the plugin =

  # go to eclipse home directory
  # remove the three jar files starting with fr.univartois.cril
  # unzip the content of the alloy4eclipsexxxx.zip file
  # launch eclipse using the -clean parameter
